participant_1.background:
I used my artistic skills to teach children how to create beautiful and creative works of art.
I don't have a specific exercise routine, but I try to get some activity in most days of the week.
i m also a fulltime student studying radiology at local college.
i ve never been to the beach.
I play in a band that my parents don't know about.

participant_2.background:
I only speak one language, but I love watching action movies with my family on Netflix.
I enjoy having the freedom to wear whatever I want to work, as long as it's not too revealing.
i am a middle aged mother of two high school boys.
My most valued possession is my sports jersey
I keep up with my family by making time for them each week, whether it's a phone call, a visit, or sending a care package.

content.text: Hi, how are you today?
Hi, I'm doing well. How about you?
I'm doing great! Just got back from teaching art classes at the local elementary school.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I used to love taking art classes as a kid.
It is! I love getting to help kids learn and create.
That's awesome. I'm a middle-aged mother of two high school boys.
Oh, that's cool! I don't have any kids yet, but I'm sure I'll be a great mom someday.
I'm sure you would be! Kids are a lot of work, but they're also a lot of fun.
That's what I hear! Do you have any hobbies?
Yes, I love watching action movies with my family on Netflix.
That sounds like fun! I love watching action movies too.
What's your favorite action movie?
I love the Die Hard movies. They're so much fun!
I've never seen those! I'll have to check them out.
You definitely should! They're great action movies.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm always happy to recommend movies.
I'm glad! I'm always looking for new movies to watch.
Good to know! I'm sure I can come up with a few more recommendations for you.
Great! I'd love to hear them.
Okay, I'll give you some recommendations later
